author: Dan Van Winkle
title: Patrick Stewart Voicing a Dragon Is Enough Reason to Watch This Dragonheart: Battle for the Heartfire Trailer - Make it so.
text:
The original Dragonheart movie featured Sean Connery as the voice of a dragon, so it’s only fitting that one of its new, direct-to-video sequels would feature another famous voice: that of Sir Patrick Stewart. We’d listen to Stewart read a phone book—or moo like several different cows —so this is right up our alley, all else aside.
It’s extra fitting, considering Stewart’s voice was apparently originally used in test footage for the 1996 movie. The franchise has been plugging away with non-theatrical sequels in the meantime in order to finally fulfill Patrick Stewart’s dragon destiny/because people are watching them. If you’ve given up on certain other franchises featuring dragons, perhaps this will be able to provide your fix when it debuts on disc-based media and On Demand on June 13.
(via ComingSoon.net , image via screengrab)
